Container.Name: vscode-for-ha-core
Container.Overview: Code-server is VS Code running on a remote server, accessible through the browser.[ul][li]Allows you to edit your Home Assistant configuration directly from your web browser and can be embedded straight into the Home Assistant frontend UI.[/li][li]Installs and configures the Home Assistant, MDI icons and YAML extensions. This means that auto-completion works instantly, without the need for configuring anything.[/li][/ul][br][b][a href="https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-code-server"]Click here for additional details about the base image used[/a][/b]

Config.Name: MQTT Broker Host
Config.Description: The hostname or ip address of your mqtt broker

Config.Name: MQTT Broker Port
Config.Description: The tcp port that your mqtt broker runs on

Config.Name: MQTT Broker Username
Config.Description: The username of a user with access to your mqtt broker
